data.message: my account has been disable .. i can't log in and it keep telling me to send a ID .. i had my account for more than 6 years but befor this problem happens i haveve deleted my phone number from facebook because all the messages i recevid from facebook and i didnt know how to disable it ... So help me its very important account

replies.message: Hey Abady. We hear your frustration. If you feel your account has been disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal. You can learn more about disabled accounts and how to submit an appeal here: http://on.fb.me/1MxDppI.  Thanks for reaching out. -Kristin
